Looking for Partner Dev in SF
text:
I have an idea for an app for college kids. I'm a SWE in San Francisco, CA (23M) and am looking to get a partner dev to help me work on the development. The app is in it's infancy but, I have built the architecture in AWS. Will be building the app in react native. If you are interested in collaborating lmk. If we move forward as partners, looking to do equity of the project.

Best, ~ftumminello

title: A substantial stratospheric cooling event is now being observed
How would you go about converting a book to an audio version
text:
I am very fond of audio books: I listen to them while I exercise and when I take long drives.

I have a fairly large, prioritized list of books in text form that I'd like - at some point - to "read", or rather listen to.

More often than not, the audio version does not exist anywhere.

Modern deep learning based text to speech engines are really good for paragraph-sized text, but fail miserably on long form text.

So, question: has anyone figured out how to automate the conversion of a traditional book in text or PDF form to a listenable audiobook of somewhat acceptable quality.

More specifically: are there ML/AI based tools out there to segment a text or PDF files into chunk of a size that can be digested by modern TTS tools?

Show HN: It’s time content creators replace their business emails
text:
After spending much time on TikTok, Instagram, etc I’ve noticed a growing trend of content creators using a business email to connect with brands. You’ve seen “business inquiries: some_email@gmail.com”.

Palace Workspace replaces that email with a unique link - this link can be used by clients/brands to propose projects to that content creator. From there, both parties can track the lifecycle of the project outside the realm of email chains and social DMs.
